title: Continuation of US-Lanka ties underscored: Prabha, Osama – world’s most ruthless terrorists; US Assistant Secretary of State Robert O’Blake:
content: US Assistant Secretary of State Robert O’Blake yesterday declared that Velupillai Prabhakaran and Osama bin Laden were two of the most ruthless terrorist leaders the world has ever known. ‘Prabhakaran’s LTTE was one of the most ruthless terrorist organizations in the world….
